ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resqrcld.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | resqrcld.2 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) |
| 3 |  | sqr11d.3 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | sqr11d.4 | |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_sqrtmul | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ A ) /\ ( B e. RR /\ 0 <_ B ) ) -> ( sqrt ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sqrt ` A ) x. ( sqrt ` B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( sqrt ` ( A x. B ) ) = ( ( sqrt ` A ) x. ( sqrt ` B ) ) ) |
